# passthroughViews

**Instance Property**

An array of views that the user can interact with while the popover is visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var passthroughViews: [UIView]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a popover is active, interactions with other views are normally disabled until the popover is dismissed. Assigning an array of views to this property allows taps outside of the popover to be handled by the corresponding views.

## Configuring the popover content

- **contentViewController**: The view controller responsible for the content portion of the popover.
- **setContentView(_:animated:)**: Sets the view controller responsible for the content portion of the popover.
- **contentSize**: The size of the popover’s content view.
- **setContentSize(_:animated:)**: Changes the size of the popover’s content view.
